duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide timely and efficient completion of client transactions while maintaining accurate records and thorough proper handling of all monies assigned.
Deliver superior quality service, identifying and understanding the client's financial needs.
Support team sales process by making client calls, checking for client offers, and identifying client needs or opportunities.
Adhere to internal controls, operational procedures, and risk management policies.
Serve as secondary contact for new account openings and problem resolution, cross-selling applicable products and services to clients and prospects.
Educate clients on digital, self-service solutions including ATMs, Online and Mobile banking to make banking easier and enhance their service experience.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent education
